paper_title.en: Involvement of cytochrome P-450 enzyme activity in the selectivity and safening action of pyrazosulfuron-ethyl

description.en: To investigate the selectivity and safening action of the sulfonylurea herbicide pyrazosulfuron-ethyl (PSE), pyrazosulfuron-ethyl O-demethylase (PSEOD) activity involving oxidative metabolism by cytochrome P-450 was studied in rice (Oryza sativa L cv Nipponbare) and Cyperus serotinus Rottb. Cytochrome P-450-dependent activity was demonstrated by the use of the inducers 1,8-naphthalic anhydride and ethanol, the herbicides PSE, bensulfuron-methyl, dimepiperate and dymron, or the inhibitor piperonyl butoxide (PBO). Growth inhibition in C serotinus seedlings was more severe than that in rice seedlings. O-Dealkylation activities of PSE were induced differently in rice and in C serotinus, with distinctly higher activity in rice seedlings. The induced PSEOD activities were slightly inhibited by PBO in rice seedlings, whereas they were strongly inhibited in C serotinus seedlings. Dimepiperate and dymron were effective safeners of rice against PSE treatment. Treatments with herbicide alone resulted in less induction of PSEOD activity compared with combined treatments of the herbicide and safener. PSEOD activity in rice seedlings induced with herbicide alone was strongly inhibited by PBO, whereas it was weakly inhibited in rice seedlings induced with combinations of PSE and two safeners. These results suggest that O-demethylation by cytochrome P-450 enzymes may be involved in the metabolism of PSE and may contribute to its selectivity and safening action. Furthermore, these results suggest the existence of a multiple form of cytochrome P-450 in plants. (C) 2001 Society of Chemical Industry.

paper_title.en: Involvement of cytochrome P-450 enzyme activity in the selectivity and safening action of pyrazosulfuron-ethyl

description.en: To investigate the selectivity and safening action of the sulfonylurea herbicide pyrazosulfuron-ethyl (PSE), pyrazosulfuron-ethyl O-demethylase (PSEOD) activity involving oxidative metabolism by cytochrome P-450 was studied in rice (Oryza sativa L cv Nipponbare) and Cyperus serotinus Rottb. Cytochrome P-450-dependent activity was demonstrated by the use of the inducers 1,8-naphthalic anhydride and ethanol, the herbicides PSE, bensulfuron-methyl, dimepiperate and dymron, or the inhibitor piperonyl butoxide (PBO). Growth inhibition in C serotinus seedlings was more severe than that in rice seedlings. O-Dealkylation activities of PSE were induced differently in rice and in C serotinus, with distinctly higher activity in rice seedlings. The induced PSEOD activities were slightly inhibited by PBO in rice seedlings, whereas they were strongly inhibited in C serotinus seedlings. Dimepiperate and dymron were effective safeners of rice against PSE treatment. Treatments with herbicide alone resulted in less induction of PSEOD activity compared with combined treatments of the herbicide and safener. PSEOD activity in rice seedlings induced with herbicide alone was strongly inhibited by PBO, whereas it was weakly inhibited in rice seedlings induced with combinations of PSE and two safeners. These results suggest that O-demethylation by cytochrome P-450 enzymes may be involved in the metabolism of PSE and may contribute to its selectivity and safening action. Furthermore, these results suggest the existence of a multiple form of cytochrome P-450 in plants. (C) 2001 Society of Chemical Industry.

paper_title.en: Resistance of Rotala indica Koehne var. uliginosa Koehne to sulfonylurea herbicides

description.en: The present paper aims to quantify the degree of resistance development in Rotala indica Koehne var. uliginosa Koehne to sulfonylurea (SU) herbicides based on whole plant responses. Seeds of resistant (from Omagari City, Akita Prefecture, Japan) and susceptible (from Tsukuba City, Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan) R. indica plants were seeded in 200 cm2 pots. The plants, at the 1.5 leaf stage, were blanket-applied with different rates of three sulfonylurea herbicides: bensulfuron methyl (BSM), pyrazosulfuron ethyl (PSE) and imazosulfuron (ISN). Of the three herbicides, the weed appears to have developed the highest degree of resistance to BSM. The resistant/susceptible (R/S) values based on mortality, root length and dry weight are consistently highest at 197, 157 and 101, respectively. Responses based on shoot length, however, showed a higher R/S value for PSE. Roots of R. indica are more sensitive to higher rates of SU herbicides than the shoots. Indeed, a high degree of resistance to SU herbicides have evolved in R. indica, for which the recommended field rates are not enough for effective control of the weed.

paper_title.en: Metabolism and selectivity of rice herbicides in plants

description.en: Chemical weed control with effective and highly active herbicides has been very useful and convenient means. It has contributed to stable crop production and is labor saving. Recent herbicides have had characteristics such as high effectiveness without causing environmental pollution or harmful effects, and appropriate herbicides having high activity, low toxicity, high selectivity and being non-persistent have been developed. The metabolism of rice herbicides used mainly in Japan, such as sulfonylurea, chloroacetamide, acylamide, urea, thiocarbamate, pyrazole, triazine, diphenyl ether, phthalimide, phenoxy, aryloxyphenoxypropionate, etc., is reviewed, and its involvement in selectivity is also discussed. The metabolism of herbicides is closely related to their activity and selectivity. Differential herbicide metabolism in plants is a contributing factor of selectivity between crops and weeds. Chemicals that are more detoxified in crops and/or more activated or less detoxified in weeds are considered as being effective and selective herbicides. The metabolism of various types of rice herbicides includes: oxidative reaction (ring and chain hydroxylation, O- and N-dealkylation), hydrolysis and subsequent glucose conjugation, and glutathione conjugation in rice.These detoxicative activities are much higher in rice than weeds in paddies, and this leads to the selectivity of herbicides. Enzymes, oxidase, P-450 mono-oxygenase, esterase, acylamidase, glucosyl transferase, glutathione transferase, etc., play important roles in herbicide metabolism and selectivity.

description.en: The present paper aims to quantify the degree of resistance development in Rotala indica Koehne var. uliginosa Koehne to sulfonylurea (SU) herbicides based on whole plant responses. Seeds of resistant (from Omagari City, Akita Prefecture, Japan) and susceptible (from Tsukuba City, Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan) R. indica plants were seeded in 200 cm2 pots. Of the three herbicides, the weed appears to have developed the highest degree of resistance to BSM. Indeed, a high degree of resistance to SU herbicides have evolved in R. indica, for which the recommended field rates are not enough for effective control of the weed.

publication_name.ja: Journal of Weed Science and Technology

paper_title.ja: Accumulation of amino acids and glycinebetaine by NaCl treatment and its relation to salt tolerance in three gramineous plants.
paper_title.en: Accumulation of Amino Acids and Glycinebetaine by NaCl Treatment and its Relation to Salt Tolerance in Three Gramineous Plants.

description.ja: 3種のイネ科植物 (タイヌビエ, イネ, エノコログサ) を供試し, NaClを根部に処理することにより植物の水分収支とアミノ酸, 特にプロリンとグリシンベタインの蓄積との関係を比較検討した。水耕法で3葉期まで育てた幼植物の培地にNaClを50, 100mMで添加し, 7日間培養調査した。熱電対サイクロメータで葉身の膨圧および浸透圧を測定した。全遊離アミノ酸, プロリン, グリシンベタイン含量をアミノ酸分析計あるいはHPLCで測定した。エノコログサとタイヌビエは葉の高い膨圧ポテンシャルと低い浸透ポテンシャルが維持された (Fig. 1, 2)。これらは大きい浸透圧調節能と関連があった。エノコログサとタイヌビエにおいては塩濃度の増加に伴う全遊離アミノ酸, プロリンおよびグリシンベタイン含量の増加が主要な浸透圧調節物質因子となり塩類耐性を増加させると考えた (Fig. 3, 4, 5)。一方, イネでは塩処理に伴う浸透圧ポテンシャルの上昇及び膨圧の減少が特に第3葉で大きく, プロリンの増加は見られたが, その増加量はエノコログサやタイヌビエに比べて低かった (Fig. 4)。また, イネではグリシンベタインが検出されず, これらの事実がイネにおける浸透圧調節能の低下につながり, 塩害を大きくする要因になると推察された。
description.en: Two gramineous weeds, early watergrass (Echinochloa oryzicola Vasing) and foxtail (Setaria viridis (L.) Beauv.), and rice (Oryza sativa L. cv. Nipponbare) were exposed to salinity stress. The leaf water status, levels of amino acid, proline, and glycinebetaine of seedlings during the 7 days following root treatment of 50 and 100mM NaCl were measured. Foxtail and early watergrass were able to maintain a high turgor and high relative water content under the salinity condition. Proline content in leaves was also increased by salt stress in these plants, but this was lower in rice than in foxtail or early watergrass. Glycinebetaine content was also increased by salinity in the two weeds. However, glycinebetaine was not detected in rice leaves. It was suggested that these osmotica were associated with a greater capability for osmotic adjustment in the above weeds, resulting in implementation of the salt tolerance.

publisher.ja: The Weed Science Society of Japan
publisher.en: The Weed Science Society of Japan

description.en: Two gramineous weeds, early watergrass (Echinochloa oryzicola Vasing) and foxtail (Setaria viridis (L.) Beauv.), and rice (Oryza sativa L. cv. Nipponbare) were exposed to salinity stress. The leaf water status, levels of amino acid, proline, and glycinebetaine of seedlings during the 7 days following root treatment of 50 and 100mM NaCl were measured. Foxtail and early watergrass were able to maintain a high turgor and high relative water content under the salinity condition. Proline content in leaves was also increased by salt stress in these plants, but this was lower in rice than in foxtail or early watergrass. Glycinebetaine content was also increased by salinity in the two weeds. However, glycinebetaine was not detected in rice leaves. It was suggested that these osmotica were associated with a greater capability for osmotic adjustment in the above weeds, resulting in implementation of the salt tolerance.

paper_title.ja: 除草剤の植物体内代謝、解毒反応
薬害軽減剤フェンクロリムを基質とするイネ及びタイヌビエのグルタチオンS-トランスフェラーゼの性質
paper_title.en: Activity and Characteristics of Glutathione S-Transferase from Rice and Early Watergrass Seedlings Using Fenclorim as a Sub-strate.

description.ja: フェンクロリム(4, 6-dichloro-2-phenylpyrimidine)を基質とするグルタチオンS-トランスフェラーゼ(GST_<(fen)>)がイネおよびタイヌビエに存在することを見出した。1葉期および2葉期のイネのGST_<(fen)>活性は, 茎葉部ではタイヌビエの10倍以上であり, 根部ではタイヌビエの約1.2〜1.7倍であった。2葉期イネの根部をプレチラクロール(2-chloro-2', 6'-diethyl-N-(2-propoxyethyl)acetanilide)単独またはプレチラクロールとフェンクロリムで混合処理することにより茎葉部と根部においてGST_<(fen)>活性がともに1.2〜1.7倍に増加した。しかし, 1葉期イネではプレチラクロール単独処理のみでGST_<(fen)>活性の増加が認められ, プレチラクロールとフェンクロリムの混合処理では見られなかった。一方, タイヌビエはおいては1, 2葉期ではいずれもの処理でもGST_<(fen)>活性が増加しなかった。フェンクロリム単独処理では2葉期の両植物の根部で少しの増加が見られたのみであった。GST_<(fen)>の至適pHはイネおよびタイヌビエの茎葉部ではそれぞれpH8.4, pH6.8であり, イネの根部ではpH6.8であった。これらの結果はイネとタイヌビエのGST_<(fen)>の活性および性質が異なることを示した。
description.en: It is well known that chloroacetamide, triazine and thiocarbamate herbicides are sub-strates of glutathione S-transferase (GST) in such plants as corn, rice and sorghum. However, it had not been reported that safenets are substrates for glutathione conjugation by GST. Using HPLC, we observed the enzymatic conjugation of glutathione and fenclorim by GST_<(fen)> in rice and early watergrass seedlings and investigated the GST_<(fen)> activities induced in 1-and 2-leaf-stage seedlings treated with pretilachlor or fenclorim alone and in combination. Optimum pH of GST_<(fen)> was pH 8.4 and pH 6.8 in rice shoot and root, respectively, and pH 6.8 in early watergrass shoot (Fig. 3). GST_<(fen)> activity in rice shoot and root was more than 10-fold and 1.2 to 1.7-fold higher than in early watergrass shoot and root, respectively (Tables 1, 2). In 2-leaf-stage rice seedlings, however, except for rice subjected to fenclorim treatment, GST_<(fen)> activity increased 1.2-1.7 fold by the treatment. These results suggest that the activity and characteristics of GST_<(fen)> are different between rice and early watergrass seedlings.

publisher.en: The Weed Science Society of Japan

publication_name.en: Journal of Weed Science and Technology

paper_title.ja: Effect of pretilachlor and fenclorim on growth and glutathione S-transferase activity of rice and early watergrass.
paper_title.en: Effect of Pretilachlor and Fenclorim on Growth and Glutathione S-Transferase Activity of Rice and Early Watergrass.

description.ja:
プレチラクロールまたはフェンクロリム処理時のイネとタイヌビエの生育とプレチラクロールまたはCDNBを基質としたグルタチオン S-トランスフェラーゼ (GST) 活性について特に初期の生育段階を通じて調べた。
種子処理一週間および一葉期幼苗処理において, プレチラクロールによるイネの茎葉部と根部の生育の50%阻害濃度はタイヌビエの場合より高かった。3×10-6, 1×10-5, 2×10-5Mフェンクロリムと混合処理すると, イネ茎葉部および根部のプレチラクロールによる生育抑制が軽減された。タイヌビエは, 種子処理ではその軽減効果が見られなかったが, 一葉期ではある程度回復が見られた (Fig. 2a～f)。
イネにおけるGST(pret.)活性はタイヌビエより高かった。両植物の茎葉部と根部におけるGST(pret.)活性は0.5葉期から一葉期まで生長につれて増加したが, 両植物間のGST(pret.)活性の差は少なくなった (Table 1)。種子に2×10-5Mフェンクロリムと10-5Mプレチラクロールを単独または混合で処理した場合, 一週間後のイネの茎葉部におけるGST(pret.)活性はそれぞれ無処理の1.6, 1.6, 1.8倍になったが, タイヌビエでは0.86, 1.4, 1.5倍になった (Table 2)。この時のイネのGST(pret.)およびGST(CDNB)活性はタイヌビエよりかなり高かった。イネにおけるGST(CDNB)活性は混合処理により1.4倍に増加したが, 単独処理では増加が認められなかった。タイヌビエのGST(CDNB)活性は単剤または混合処理により増加した。一葉期に24時間2×10-5Mフェンクロリムと10-4Mプレチラクロールの単独または混合で処理すると, イネのGST(pret.)活性は茎葉部でそれぞれ1.6, 1.2, 2.5倍に高くなり, 根部でそれぞれ3.6, 3.7, 5.5倍に増加した (Table 3)。タイヌビエ茎葉部では, それぞれ無処理の1.1, 0.86, 1.2倍であり, 根部でもそれぞれ約1.7, 1.7, 2.4倍であった。イネ茎葉部と根部におけるGST(CDNB)活性は, フェンクロリム単剤または混合処理により増加したが, プレチラクロール処理では増加しなかった。タイヌビエ茎葉部では各薬剤処理によりそのGST活性が大きく増加した。二葉期においても一葉期と同様の結果であったが, イネ根部での薬剤処理によるGST(pret.)活性の増加がそれぞれ1.3, 2.8, 3.6倍と若干低かった。
これらの結果から, イネとタイヌビエではGST酵素の基質特異性が異なる, あるいは, アイソザイムが存在すると考えられる。プレチラクロールに対するイネとタイヌビエの選択性はGST(pret.)活性またはその誘導に起因するであろう。また, プレチラクロールの薬害におけるフェンクロリムの軽減機構には, GST(pret.)酵素の誘導が強く関連するものと推察した。
description.en:
The growth and glutathione S-transferase (GST) activities of rice and early watergrass seedlings as affected by pretilachlor and/or fenclorim were investigated, especially in early growth stages.
After the seeds were treated with pretilachlor for one week, the I50 value in rice was higher than that of the early watergrass. The inhibition of growth by pretilachlor treatment to seeds was reversed in the rice by fenclorim treatment but not in the early watergrass seedlings. The effects of pretilachlor were similar to the seed treatment, but fenclorim reversed the growth inhibition caused by pretilachlor treatment in the two plants of 1-leaf-stage.
GST(pret.) activities of both plants increased progressively with growth from 0.5- to 2-leaf-stage, although these activities were higher in rice. As the plant grew, however, difference in GST activities between two plant species lessened. GST(pret.) activities in rice were increased with individual or simultaneous treatments of fenclorim (2×10-5M) and pretilachlor (10-5 or 10-4M); the activities in early watergrass were increased mainly with the simultaneous treatment at the seed and 1-leaf-stage. GST activities of both plants varied with different substrates, i. e., pretilachlor and CDNB. Differences in GST(pret.) activities might explain the selectivity between rice and early watergrass of pretilachlor. Moreover, the recovery from growth inhibition caused by pretilachlor might be due to induction of GST enzyme by fenclorim.

publisher.ja: The Weed Science Society of Japan
publisher.en: The Weed Science Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: Effect of Pretilachlor and Fenclorim on Growth and Glutathione S-Transferase Activity of Rice and Early Watergrass.
paper_title.en: Effect of pretilachlor and fenclorim on growth and glutathione S-transferase activity of rice and early watergrass.

種子処理一週間および一葉期幼苗処理において, プレチラクロールによるイネの茎葉部と根部の生育の50%阻害濃度はタイヌビエの場合より高かった。3×10-6, 1×10-5, 2×10-5Mフェンクロリムと混合処理すると, イネ茎葉部および根部のプレチラクロールによる生育抑制が軽減された。タイヌビエは, 種子処理ではその軽減効果が見られなかったが, 一葉期ではある程度回復が見られた (Fig. 2a～f)。
イネにおけるGST(pret.)活性はタイヌビエより高かった。両植物の茎葉部と根部におけるGST(pret.)活性は0.5葉期から一葉期まで生長につれて増加したが, 両植物間のGST(pret.)活性の差は少なくなった (Table 1)。種子に2×10-5Mフェンクロリムと10-5Mプレチラクロールを単独または混合で処理した場合, 一週間後のイネの茎葉部におけるGST(pret.)活性はそれぞれ無処理の1.6, 1.6, 1.8倍になったが, タイヌビエでは0.86, 1.4, 1.5倍になった (Table 2)。この時のイネのGST(pret.)およびGST(CDNB)活性はタイヌビエよりかなり高かった。イネにおけるGST(CDNB)活性は混合処理により1.4倍に増加したが, 単独処理では増加が認められなかった。タイヌビエのGST(CDNB)活性は単剤または混合処理により増加した。一葉期に24時間2×10-5Mフェンクロリムと10-4Mプレチラクロールの単独または混合で処理すると, イネのGST(pret.)活性は茎葉部でそれぞれ1.6, 1.2, 2.5倍に高くなり, 根部でそれぞれ3.6, 3.7, 5.5倍に増加した (Table 3)。タイヌビエ茎葉部では, それぞれ無処理の1.1, 0.86, 1.2倍であり, 根部でもそれぞれ約1.7, 1.7, 2.4倍であった。イネ茎葉部と根部におけるGST(CDNB)活性は, フェンクロリム単剤または混合処理により増加したが, プレチラクロール処理では増加しなかった。タイヌビエ茎葉部では各薬剤処理によりそのGST活性が大きく増加した。二葉期においても一葉期と同様の結果であったが, イネ根部での薬剤処理によるGST(pret.)活性の増加がそれぞれ1.3, 2.8, 3.6倍と若干低かった。
これらの結果から, イネとタイヌビエではGST酵素の基質特異性が異なる, あるいは, アイソザイムが存在すると考えられる。プレチラクロールに対するイネとタイヌビエの選択性はGST(pret.)活性またはその誘導に起因するであろう。また, プレチラクロールの薬害におけるフェンクロリムの軽減機構には, GST(pret.)酵素の誘導が強く関連するものと推察した。
description.en:
The growth and glutathione S-transferase (GST) activities of rice and early watergrass seedlings as affected by pretilachlor and/or fenclorim were investigated, especially in early growth stages.
After the seeds were treated with pretilachlor for one week, the I50 value in rice was higher than that of the early watergrass. The inhibition of growth by pretilachlor treatment to seeds was reversed in the rice by fenclorim treatment but not in the early watergrass seedlings. The effects of pretilachlor were similar to the seed treatment, but fenclorim reversed the growth inhibition caused by pretilachlor treatment in the two plants of 1-leaf-stage.
GST(pret.) activities of both plants increased progressively with growth from 0.5- to 2-leaf-stage, although these activities were higher in rice. As the plant grew, however, difference in GST activities between two plant species lessened. GST(pret.) activities in rice were increased with individual or simultaneous treatments of fenclorim (2×10-5M) and pretilachlor (10-5 or 10-4M); the activities in early watergrass were increased mainly with the simultaneous treatment at the seed and 1-leaf-stage. GST activities of both plants varied with different substrates, i. e., pretilachlor and CDNB. Differences in GST(pret.) activities might explain the selectivity between rice and early watergrass of pretilachlor. Moreover, the recovery from growth inhibition caused by pretilachlor might be due to induction of GST enzyme by fenclorim.

publisher.en: The Weed Science Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: Characterization of Oxyfluorfen Tolerance in Selected Soybean Cell Line(共著)
Selection for Herbicide Tolerance in Soybean Using Cell Suspension Culture(共著)

ja.name: ポーンプロム トッサポン

paper_title.ja: Absorption and Metabolism of Oxyfluorfen in Tolerant Soybean Cell(共著)
paper_title.en: Absorption and Metabolism of Oxyfluorfen in Tolerant Soybean Cells.

ja.name: ポーンプロム トッサポン

description.ja: The absorption and metabolism of oxyfluorfen were determined in oxyfluorfen-tolerant and non-tolerant (normal) soybean cell lines. The tolerant cells absorbed considerably less of the herbicide than the normal cells. Metabolism of oxyfluorfen did not differ between the two cell lines. These data suggest that lower absorption in the tolerant cells may contribute to the observed tolerance but that the tolerance is not metabolism-based.
description.en: The absorption and metabolism of oxyfluorfen were determined in oxyfluorfen-tolerant and non-tolerant (normal) soybean cell lines. The tolerant cells absorbed considerably less of the herbicide than the normal cells. Metabolism of oxyfluorfen did not differ between the two cell lines. These data suggest that lower absorption in the tolerant cells may contribute to the observed tolerance but that the tolerance is not metabolism-based.

publisher.en: The Weed Science Society of Japan

paper_title.ja: Auxinic Activity of Clomeprop and Its Hydrolytic Metabolite and Their Binding to Maize Auxin-Binding Protein(共著)
paper_title.en: Auxinic Activity of Clomeprop and Its Hydrolytic Metabolite and Their Binding to Maize Auxin-Binding Protein

description.ja:
クロメプロップは植物体内でアリルアシルアミダーゼにより素早く加水分解されDMPAとなり, より強いオーキシン活性を示すことが示唆されている。しかし, クロメプロップ自身がオーキシン活性を示すかについての検討は十分にはなされていない。
クロメプロップ自身がオーキシン作用を示すかどうかを調べるために, 種々のオーキシン活性試験, 除草剤活性試験, 原形質膜上のオーキシン作用の受容体と推定されているオーキシン結合蛋白質との結合活性試験を行い, 加水分解代謝物であるDMPA, オーキシン活性の指標とした, IAAとNAA, アンチオーキシンであるPCIBとの比較を行った。
(1) 代表的なオーキシン活性試験である, トウモロコシ子葉鞘伸長促進活性試験, ヤエナリ下胚軸屈曲試験, エチレン生成促進試験においてDMPAはIAAやNAAよりもやや低いが, クロメプロップよりも高い活性を示した (Fig. 2, Fig. 3, Fig. 4, Fig. 5)。
(2) トウモロコシ, ヤエナリでの生育阻害試験においてクロメプロップはDMPA, IAA, NAAより低い生育阻害活性を示した (Fig. 6, Fig. 7)。
(3) クロメプロップは原形質膜上のオーキシン作用の受容体と推定されている, オーキシン結合蛋白質にオーキシンとして認識されなかったが, DMPA, IAA, NAA, PCIBは認識された (Fig. 8)。
以上の結果より, クロメプロップ自身はオーキシン活性を示さず, 植物体内でDMPAに加水分解された後に初めてオーキシン結合蛋白質にオーキシンとして認識され, オーキシン活性を示している可能性が高い。
description.en: Clomeprop [2-(2, 4-dichloro-3-methyl phenoxy) propionanilide] is classified as a hormone-type herbicide, and was reported tohydrolyze to DMPA [2-(2, 4-dichloro-3-methyl phenoxy) propionic acid] in plants. Auxinic activity of clomeprop was compared with DMPA and several plant hormones to investigate whether clomeprop itself exhibit auxinic activity. Results were as follows: (1) In all the auxinic activity tests performed: maize coleoptile elongation test, mung bean slit test and ethylene production test, clomeprop exhibited lower auxinic activity than its metabolite DMPA. (2) DMPA showed higher inhibitory activity on maize and mung bean growth than clomeprop. (3) DMPA bound with the putative maize membrane-bound auxin receptor, while clomeprop did not. It can thus be concluded that clomeprop has no auxinic activity and that the metabolite DMPA is the active compound in the auxinic action.
